page.title: 17Where people go for services
page.content: With the exception of Tetchill's Post Office, the only services in our area are telephone boxes and post boxes. Thus it is clear that people have to go further afield.Upper Frankton has a number of basic services such as a garage, a general store and a post office to which the locals can go. Recently a 'pub', "The Narrowboat" has opened by the canal at Frankton. A surprisingly large range of services are available in Ellesmere and many farmers still go there on Fridays. The most popular stock market is Oswestry and it is also a popular shopping centre. If people are in search of entertainment they often go to pubs in Ellesmere or to the Old Comrades Club while, slightly nearer, the Ellesmere College Arts Centre provides films and live entertainment. The college's squash facilities are also popular.
